wikipedia_page.main: John William Evans (26 May 1875 – 5 July 1947) was a Welsh rugby union forward who played club rugby for Blaina and international rugby for Wales. A collier by trade, Evans typified the style of forward player favoured by the Welsh selectors during the early 1900s.

response: John William Evans may refer to:
*John William Evans (Welsh politician) (1870–1906), Liberal local politician in South Wales
* John William Evans (entomologist) (); see Cicadomorpha and Planthopper
